title: Workplace Learning Recognition and Practical e-Portfolio Utilization Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level job expertise and fundamental digital literacy
context.additional_context: Emphasizes systematically recognizing and sharing informal workplace learning experiences through portfolio-based learning activities in smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environments.

learning_goals: Learners can structure and demonstrate practical competencies acquired from workplace experience via an e-portfolio.
Learners can exchange feedback with peers and instructors using an e-portfolio to improve learning outcomes.
Learners can meet credit or certification requirements recognized by non-degree vocational institutions through portfolio-based assessment.
Learners can collect and manage learning evidence using smartphone applications.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
